skills.name: SLICE
desc: • Deals 2 hits of magic damage to a single target.
• Heal up to 2 random allies if the target is stunned by this attack.

skills.name: STARE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of magic damage to all enemies.
• Increase DEF and MR of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: TRANQUILIZE
desc: Drains the enemy’s Fury every turn. This passive does not affect a Maxed Fury meter.
